text: Hi I have implemented the chatbot workflow in a software app(lets call it as LH) using HubSpot test account app.  LH is going to be production soon. So how do I convert this HubSpot test account app to use in production?
we have a separate development and production app for all of ours. helps limit who has access to tokens and such. so i would say make a new app just for the production version. my 2 cents.
My client uses a HubSpot App which contains the chatbot workflow. How do I make use of that? Is the code snippet in chatbot workflow setting is all I need to use it?
